commits.message: Re-apply patch for default language fallback on top of latest qTranslate version

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PowerKiKi/qTranslate

Conflicts:
	lang/qtranslate-de_DE.mo
	lang/qtranslate-ms_MY.mo
	qtranslate.php
	qtranslate_configuration.php
	qtranslate_core.php
	qtranslate_hooks.php
	qtranslate_javascript.php
	qtranslate_wphacks.php
	readme.txt
DEL plugin lightbox-gallery because obsolete version and was never modified
ADD option to fallback to default language
DEL obsolete plugin. The official version now includes latest fixes and is available at http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/comment-validation/
FIX jquery compatibility according to this post: http://wordpress.org/support/topic/323475

issue_comments.body: The repository is now available at https://github.com/PowerKiKi/qTranslate/

Thank you for your bug report, however I suggest you report that upstream: http://www.qianqin.de/qtranslate/forum/

As you probably noticed I don't have much time to maintain this fork more than basic integration with my patch. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Hi,

This project is a fork of the original qTranslate, and I do not actively develop it. I do the strict minimum to provide new option to fallback on default language. So I won't be able to help you, if your issue is not directly related with default language fallback.

I would suggest completing your message with expected result and actual result and then using official forums for bug reporting: http://www.qianqin.de/qtranslate/forum/

Hi,

This project is a fork of the original qTranslate, and I do not actively develop it. I do the strict minimum to provide new option to fallback on default language. So I won't be able to help you if your issue is not directly related with default language fallback.

I would suggest using official forums for bug reporting: http://www.qianqin.de/qtranslate/forum/

Hi,

This repository is a fork of the original qTranslate, and I do not actively develop it. I do the strict minimum to provide new option to fallback on default language. So I won't be able to merge your PR if it is not directly related to default language fallback.

I would suggest using official forums for: http://www.qianqin.de/qtranslate/forum/

On a sidenote, `__DIR__` is available since PHP 5.3 which was released +4 years ago (June 2009) and two "major" version were released since. So my personal opinion would be not to merge this PR anyway, but upgrade PHP instead (or change hosting provider). But feel free to try your luck with the original project developer.

Hi,

This repository is a fork of the original qTranslate, and I do not actively develop it. I do the strict minimum to provide new option to fallback on default language. So I won't be able to merge your PR if it is not directly related to default language fallback. And I am not mistaken it is not.

I would suggest using official forums for: http://www.qianqin.de/qtranslate/forum/

On a sidenote, I would try to avoid mixing formatting changes (whitespaces) with bugfix. It makes it hard to read what you actually fix. Even though I 100% agree that trailing whitespace should be deleted...

Thanks anyway for your work ! and hopefully Qian Qin will be able to merge your patch.

Hello,

As I told you 5 months ago, in #5, this repository is a fork of the original qTranslate, and I do not actively develop it. I do the **strict minimum** to provide new option to fallback on default language. So I **won't be able to merge your PR** if it is not directly related to default language fallback.

I would suggest using official forums for: http://www.qianqin.de/qtranslate/forum/

On a sidenote, `QT_SUPPORTED_WP_VERSION` purpose is to manually update it after testing the plugin with new Wordpress version. Automatically incrementing it totally ruins the concept. I don't think it's a good idea. Or at least the code should be be entirely deleted, since it does not have any effect anymore.

commit_comments.body: I just pushed the latest version, please try again. If it does not work, feel free to open an issue: https://github.com/PowerKiKi/qTranslate/issues/new

issue_comments.body: Haha okay, I'm sorry! I'll post on the forum, thank you!

commit_comments.body:
Hi, I'm running WP 3.4.2 and this patch seems doesn't works anymore... have you got the same problem?
PS: I appreciate your work to do better qtranslate
